__comment__0: I don't know why, but apparently just adding .tooltip at the end of a key works, even though I
__comment__1: don't see it anywhere in the code. Perfectly adds the tooltips. I'm not complaining though.
text.config.wyoming.title: Wyoming Options
text.config.wyoming.option.nametags.snea:
Make nametags behave like the tag from a sneaking entity.
This will make items invisible through walls.
text.config.wyoming.enum.unIDMode.name: Show item name
text.config.wyoming.option.visual.disabl:
Disables the bobbing animation of dropped items.
Buoyancy is a feature of Minecraft 1.13+, and due to Wynncraft
running on 1.12, the items 'glitch' up and down.
text.config.wyoming.option.visual.stacki:
The ratio of items to be stacked.
For example, a ratio of 2 will join 2 items into one visual item.
